body_html:
Unrelated question, what does CTC stand for ? PR is Pull Request I guess, but I don't have the first acronym.

Anyway thanks for your answers ! I plan on publishing with pip (and maybe in pytroch/contrib) a custom implementation of correlation module (see here ) as soon as an official kernel accessor is available ! :D

Anyway thanks for your answers ! I plan on publishing with pip (and maybe in pytroch/contrib) a custom implementation of correlation module (see here ) as soon as an official kernel accessor is available ! :D
body:
Unrelated question, what does CTC stand for ? PR is Pull Request I guess, but I don't have the first acronym.

Anyway thanks for your answers ! I plan on publishing with pip (and maybe in pytroch/contrib) a custom implementation of correlation module (see [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/4073) ) as soon as an official kernel accessor is available ! :D
